context.rdfs:comment: A datasheet or vendor specification of a Datagram core (in the sense of a prototypical description).
context.rdfs:label: DatagramCoreModel

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer from a previous, often discontinued variant of the Datagram core to its newer variant.
properties.rdfs:label: predecessorOf

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer from a newer variant of a Datagram core to its previous, often discontinued predecessor.
properties.rdfs:label: successorOf

properties.rdfs:comment: A pointer to a base Datagram core from which this Datagram core is a variant. It is safe to infer that the variant inherits all Datagram core features from the base model, unless defined locally. This is not transitive.
properties.rdfs:label: isVariantOf
